        public genObstacle(int ID,
           boolean collision,
           boolean visible,
           int hurting)
        Main constructor.
        Parameters:
        ID - is the ID on the SpriteSheet
        collision - if the block collide or not
        visible - if the block is visible or not
        hurting - if the block is hurting or not

      • genObstacle

        public genObstacle(int ID,
           boolean collisionTop,
           boolean collisionBot,
           boolean collisionSide,
           boolean visible,
           int hurting)
        Accurate Constructor
        Parameters:
        ID - is the ID on the SpriteSheet
        collisionTop - if there is a collision on the top of the block
        collisionBot - if there is a collision on the bottom of the block
        collisionSide - if there is a collision on the side of the block
        visible - if the block is visible or not
        hurting - if the block is hurting or not
